lead_paragraph: MECK--Jean Anderegg. Of Hanover, NH and Prouts Neck, ME died peacefully in her New Hampshire home on December 12, 2015. She was 103. Jean was born in Chicago, Il on July 27, 1912, and was married to John F. Meck, Dartmouth College Vice President, until his death in 1978. Jean was a graduate of Bryn Mawr with a Master's degree from Radcliffe. She is remembered with love and awe by her three children and their spouses: Sally Meck Pinkham (John), John F. Meck III (Janet) and Julie Meck Peet (Charles). She is survived by five grandchildren and five great-grandchildren. A memorial service celebrating Jean's life will be held in Prouts Neck, ME in late June. For further details and to send condolences, visit: Rand-Wilson.com. Donations may be made in Jean's honor to Howe Library, Hanover, NH or Charles E. Thomas Library in Prouts Neck, Scarborough, ME. Services are under the direction of the Rand-Wilson Funeral Home of Hanover, NH. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  MECK, JEAN ANDEREGG
